member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File
member.summary: The metadata for a file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Kind
member.summary: The type of file. This is always drive#file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Id
member.summary: The ID of the file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Etag
member.summary: ETag of the file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.SelfLink
member.summary: A link back to this file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.WebContentLink
member.summary: A link for downloading the content of the file in a browser using cookie based authentication.
member.remarks: In cases where the content is shared publicly, the content can be downloaded without any credentials.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.WebViewLink
member.summary: A link only available on public folders for viewing their static web assets (HTML, CSS, JS, etc) via Google Drive's Website Hosting.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.AlternateLink
member.summary: A link for opening the file in a relevant Google editor or viewer.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.EmbedLink
member.summary: A link for embedding the file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.OpenWithLinks
member.summary: A map of the id of each of the user's apps to a link to open this file with that app.
member.remarks: Only populated when the drive.apps.readonly scope is used.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.DefaultOpenWithLinks
member.summary: A link to open this file with the user's default app for this file.
member.remarks: Only populated when the drive.apps.readonly scope is used.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.IconLink
member.summary: A link to the file's icon.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.ThumbnailLink
member.summary: A short-lived link to the file's thumbnail.
member.remarks: Typically lasts on the order of hours.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Thumbnail
member.summary: Thumbnail for the file.
member.remarks: Only accepted on upload and for files that are not already thumbnailed by Google.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Title
member.summary: The title of the file. Used to identify file or folder name.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.MimeType
member.summary: The MIME type of the file.
member.remarks: This is only mutable on update when uploading new content. This field can be left blank, and the mimetype will be determined from the uploaded content's MIME type.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Description
member.summary: A short description of the file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Labels
member.summary: A group of labels for the file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.CreatedDate
member.summary: Create time for this file

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Last time this file was modified by anyone
member.remarks: This is only mutable on update when the setModifiedDate parameter is set.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.ModifiedByMeDate
member.summary: Last time this file was modified by the user.
member.remarks: Note that setting will also update the date for the user which set the date.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.LastViewedByMeDate
member.summary: Last time this file was viewed by the user.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.MarkedViewedByMeDate
member.summary: Time this file was explicitly marked viewed by the user.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.SharedWithMeDate
member.summary: Time at which this file was shared with the user.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Version
member.summary: A monotonically increasing version number for the file.
member.remarks: This reflects every change made to the file on the server, even those not visible to the requesting user.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.SharingUser
member.summary: User that shared the item with the current user, if available.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Parents
member.summary: Collection of parent folders which contain this file.
member.remarks: Setting this field will put the file in all of the provided folders. On insert, if no folders are provided, the file will be placed in the default root folder.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.DownloadUrl
member.summary: The download URL

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.ExportLinks
member.summary: Links for exporting Google Docs to specific formats.
member.remarks: A mapping from export format to URL

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.IndexableText
member.summary: Indexable text attributes for the file.
member.remarks: This property can only be written, and is not returned by files.get.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.UserPermissions
member.summary: The permissions for the authenticated user on this file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Permissions
member.summary: The list of permissions for users with access to this file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.OriginalFilename
member.summary: The original filename if the file was uploaded manually, or the original title if the file was inserted through the API.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.FileExtension
member.summary: The final component of fullFileExtension with trailing text that does not appear to be part of the extension removed.
member.remarks: This field is only populated for files with content stored in Drive; it is not populated for Google Docs or shortcut files.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.FullFileExtension
member.summary: The full file extension; extracted from the title.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Md5Checksum
member.summary: An MD5 checksum for the content of this file.
member.remarks: This field is only populated for files with content stored in Drive; it is not populated for Google Docs or shortcut files.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.FileSize
member.summary: The size of the file in bytes.
member.remarks: This field is only populated for files with content stored in Drive; it is not populated for Google Docs or shortcut files.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.QuotaBytesUsed
member.summary: The number of quota bytes used by this file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.OwnerNames
member.summary: Name(s) of the owner(s) of this file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Owners
member.summary: The owner(s) of this file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.LastModifyingUserName
member.summary: Name of the last user to modify this file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.LastModifyingUser
member.summary: The last user to modify this file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.OwnedByMe
member.summary: Whether the file is owned by the current user.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Editable
member.summary: Whether the file can be edited by the current user.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.CanComment
member.summary: Whether the current user can comment on the file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Shareable
member.summary: Whether the file's sharing settings can be modified by the current user.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Copyable
member.summary: Whether the file can be copied by the current user.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.WritersCanShare
member.summary: Whether writers can share the document with other users.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Shared
member.summary: Whether the file has been shared.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.ExplicitlyTrashed
member.summary: Whether this file has been explicitly trashed, as opposed to recursively trashed.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.AppDataContents
member.summary: Whether this file is in the Application Data folder.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.HeadRevisionId
member.summary: The ID of the file's head revision.
member.remarks: This field is only populated for files with content stored in Drive; it is not populated for Google Docs or shortcut files.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Properties
member.summary: The list of properties.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.FolderColorRgb
member.summary: Folder color as an RGB hex string if the file is a folder.
member.remarks: The list of supported colors is available in the field of the About resource. If an unsupported color is specified, it will be changed to the closest color in the palette.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.ImageMediaMetadata
member.summary: Metadata about image media.
member.remarks: This will only be present for image types, and its contents will depend on what can be parsed from the image content.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.VideoMediaMetadata
member.summary: Metadata about video media.
member.remarks: This will only be present for video types.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.Spaces
member.summary: The list of spaces which contain the file.
member.remarks: Supported values are 'drive', 'appDataFolder' and 'photos'.

member.name: M:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.File.ToString
member.summary: Gibt eine Zeichenfolge zurück, die das aktuelle Objekt darstellt.

member.name: T:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.FileLabels
member.summary: A group of labels for a file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.FileLabels.Starred
member.summary: Whether this file is starred by the user.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.FileLabels.Hidden
member.summary: Deprecated

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.FileLabels.Trashed
member.summary: Whether this file has been trashed.
member.remarks: This label applies to all users accessing the file; however, only owners are allowed to see and untrash files.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.FileLabels.Restricted
member.summary: Whether viewers and commenters are prevented from downloading, printing, and copying this file.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.FileLabels.Viewed
member.summary: Whether this file has been viewed by this user.

member.summary: The exposure mode used to create the photo.

member.summary: The exposure bias of the photo (APEX value).

member.summary: This is always drive#permission.

member.summary: The ETag of the permission.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.Permission.Id
member.summary: The ID of the user this permission refers to, and identical to the and .
member.remarks: When making a drive.permissions.insert request, exactly one of the or fields must be specified.

member.summary: A link back to this permission.

member.summary: The name for this permission.

member.summary: The primary role for this user.

member.summary: The account type.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.Permission.AuthKey
member.summary: The authkey parameter required for this permission.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.Permission.WithLink
member.summary: Whether the link is required for this permission.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.Permission.PhotoLink
member.summary: A link to the profile photo, if available.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.Permission.Value
member.summary: The email address or domain name for the entity.

remarks.para: This is used during inserts and is not populated in responses.
When making a drive.permissions.insert request, exactly one of the or fields must be specified.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.Permission.EmailAddress
member.summary: The email address of the user or group this permission refers to.
member.remarks: This is an output-only field which is present when the permission type is user or group.

member.name: P:RestSharp.Portable.Google.Drive.Model.Permission.Domain
member.summary: The domain name of the entity this permission refers to.
member.remarks: This is an output-only field which is present when the permission type is user, group or domain.
